Talk_7000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? You lost? There's only my house
and <clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff> around here.<sp:0:4:0>If you want a shop or inn, maybe go down
the road with lots of big mushrooms.
Talk_7001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want a shop or inn, they're on the
road with lots of big mushrooms.<sp:0:4:0>Out here, there's only my house and
<clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff>. Not too interesting
for a traveler.
Talk_8003:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>I thought it was just me here. How'd you
sneak up on me like that?
Talk_8004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait, what? Professor? What are you
doing in my house?!
Talk_6018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You lost or somethin'?<sp:0:4:0>Maybe you oughta go ask Reede for
directions. He's the mayor here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Actually, maybe he'd have better luck talking to
Amira and Nikki, those ladies who are always
standing around talking.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>If you want Hylian tomatoes, don't ask
me—ask my dad!<sp:0:4:0>He'll probably be in the field behind
Cece's house.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200>I wanna be first at <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff> today for sure,
so get outta my way!
Talk_6020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're havin' trouble with somethin',
you should ask an adult. I'm just a kid.<sp:0:4:0>I dunno, maybe Reede could help? He is
the mayor, after all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm...or maybe it'd be better to ask Amira.
That lady knows an awful lot about what goes
on in the village.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_5106: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What is it? And can it wait? I'm starving!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Some Hylian tomatoes would hit the spot!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_7007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You lost, Professor? There's only
my house and <clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff>
around here.<sp:0:4:0>If you want a shop or inn, maybe go down
the road with lots of big mushrooms.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>I wanna be first at <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff> today for sure,
so get outta my way!<sp:0:4:0>If you want <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>, go ask my
dad in the field behind Cece's house.
Talk_5107: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I told you, I'm too hungry to talk!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Gotta get me a Hylian tomato to munch on!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_7008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm? You lost or somethin'? This isn't an
inn—it's just my house.<sp:0:4:0>The only thing by it is <clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff>
over there.<sp:0:4:0>If it's an inn you're lookin' for, maybe try
the road with lots of big mushrooms.
Talk_5108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Whatever it is, Professor, can it wait until
later? I'm starving!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Gotta get me a Hylian tomato to munch on!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_6023: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, shoot! Is this the wrong house?!
Talk_7009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You lost or somethin', Professor? This
isn't an inn, it's just my house.<sp:0:4:0>The only thing by it is <clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff>
over there.<sp:0:4:0>If it's an inn you're lookin' for, maybe try
the road with lots of big mushrooms.
Near_7000: Too dark to stay out now.
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>If you want Hylian tomatoes, ask my dad!<sp:0:4:0>He's always in the field behind Cece's
house, even when it's raining.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200>I wanna be first at <clr:0000>school<clr:ffff> today for sure,
so get outta my way!
Talk_5110: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>What! No! I didn't snatch any tomatoes!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>*gulp* Gotta swallow the evidence, quick!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_7011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want a shop or inn, they're on the
road with lots of big mushrooms.<sp:0:4:0>Out here, there's only my house and
<clr:0000>Ms. Zelda's house<clr:ffff>. Not too interesting
for you, Professor.
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Mornin'!<sp:0:4:0>I mean...<sp:5:1:0>good morning!<sp:0:4:0>Mom says I'm supposed to be polite to
grown-ups and teachers.
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've learned a bunch ever since they
started the school!<sp:0:4:0>Not every class is fun. <clr:0000>History<clr:ffff> lessons
put me to sleep sometimes.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>But I love it every time we learn about
<clr:0000>farming stuff<clr:ffff>!
Talk_5112:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Professor?! This isn't what it looks like!
I'd never snatch veggies from my own
dad's fields!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>*cough* Almost choked on the tomato skin there...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_6027:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Understand_01>From the outside, it still looks like the
same house. But on the inside, it's real
different than when I lived here.<sp:0:4:0>I wish Dad would make his room cuter,
though. Like Cece's!
Talk_5113:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You curious about my <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>,
Professor?<sp:0:4:0>They're my prize crop. I put a lot of love
into growing those.<sp:0:4:0>They're in season now, so help yourself
to a few down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
Talk_5114:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Hah! Finish your tomatoes before you
talk, girl.<sp:0:4:0>You know why they're that good, right?
It's 'cause your dad put so much love and
care into growin' 'em.<sp:0:4:0>Folks love 'em so much that they
even outsell pumpkins down at the
<clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
Talk_6030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Painful>Eep! I've been spotted!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I used to live in this house, and I still get
absentminded and come here by mistake.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My real home is that colorful house on the
outskirts of the village!<sp:0:4:0>There's froggies nearby, and Ms. Zelda
lives close to us too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Understand_00>I'm real glad we moved there!
Talk_9005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hey, question. When catching froggies,
you sneak up on 'em without making a
sound, right?<sp:0:4:0>It never works for me the way it did for
Ms. Zelda. She made it look easy.
Talk_5117:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You curious about my <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>They're my prize crop. I put a lot of love
into growing those.<sp:0:4:0>I sell 'em wholesale to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>,
so go check 'em out there. It'll get you
out of the rain, at least.
Talk_6033:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Professor? Are you lost or somethin'?<sp:0:4:0>Maybe you oughta go ask Reede for
directions. He's the mayor here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm...or maybe it'd be better to ask Amira.
That lady knows an awful lot about what goes
on in the village.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_9007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sigh_01>Ms. Zelda said this well is where the
froggies live.<sp:0:4:0>The way to catch froggies is to sneak up
on them without a sound, right?<sp:0:4:0>I try to do that, but I'm still not as good
at catching them as Ms. Zelda.
Talk_6034: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Well, I'm gettin' wet, so bye for now!
Talk_5120:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You curious about my <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>,
Professor?<sp:0:4:0>They're my prize crop. I put a lot of love
into growing those.<sp:0:4:0>I sell 'em wholesale to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>,
so go check 'em out there. It'll get you
out of the rain, at least.
Talk_5121:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You curious about my <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>They're my prize crop. I put a lot of love
into growing those.<sp:0:4:0>They're in season now, so help yourself
to a few down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
Talk_5122:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What is it? And can it wait? I'm starving!<sp:0:4:0>Besides, it's raining, so I want to go
check on my dad in the fields.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I hope he saved me a Hylian tomato...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_5123: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I told you, I'm too busy to talk!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Gotta get me a Hylian tomato to munch on!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_9012:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, I forgot to mention the froggies'
house is near here too!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though it's more like a well than a house.
Talk_5124:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Whatever it is, Professor, can it wait until
later? I'm starving!<sp:0:4:0>Besides, it's raining, so I want to go
check on my dad in the fields.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I hope he saved me a Hylian tomato...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_8000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There were some parts of the Calamity
lesson that put me to sleep a little.<sp:0:4:0>But the Ancient Hero class was great!
You should come to our class again!
Talk_8001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Class has been so much fun since you
started teaching, Professor. <sp:5:0:0>Thanks.
